title: Sengoku Kitan Youtouden Movie (Wrath of the Ninja)
synopsis: The year a comet races across the sky, splitting the heavens, from the depths of the Earth the dark god shall arise once again. Then, the dark evil lurking in the shadows shall come out of the depths of Hell and show itself in the present world. The emotions of the blade of the wind shall collect at the source of the blue light. And the three blades shall become one, vanquishing evil.
characters: ['Hayami, Ayame', 'Sakon, Hayate', 'Mori, Ranmaru', 'Kogure, Ryouma', 'Fuma Ninja 3', "Gen'yusai", 'Jinpei', 'Kayo', 'Fuma Ninja 2', 'Genzo']
staff: [['Yamasaki, Osamu', ['Director']], ['Watanabe, Junichi', ['Character Design']], ['Sagawa, Senri', ['Art Director']], ['Katsumata, Geki', ['Art Director']]]
